-- DaoTerritories_D3_Update -- 2014/2/9 日立 太郎 UPDATE [Territories] SET
[TerritoryID] = @Set_TerritoryID_forUPD, [TerritoryDescription] = @Set_TerritoryDescription_forUPD, [RegionID] = @Set_RegionID_forUPD,
WHERE AND [TerritoryID] = @TerritoryIDAND [TerritoryID] IS NULL AND [TerritoryDescription] = @TerritoryDescriptionAND [TerritoryDescription] IS NULL AND [RegionID] = @RegionIDAND [RegionID] IS NULL
